entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yoho (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yoho National Park 12:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -27.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -31.2°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
